column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've been here a few times and usually leave pretty satisfied.  The atmosphere is very fun and is great for groups.  Last time I tried the cava sangria
column2: which I found to be very tasty.  The tapas are pretty good
column3: but definitely not the best I've had.  The service is always friendly
column4: which makes for a nice experience.
